name: ELIAN ► MENU (FF)
description:
Style the menus AND panels (inspired) like some menus in the FIREFOX's built in inspector.

This style is for FIREFOX only, obviously.
additional_info: (All appologies for my english) I hate light UIs. I REALLY HATE THEM. So, this is my Menu, inspired in the Firefox's built in Inspector. Things you should know: • TESTED in FF 40.0a2. (Almost every FF version change some code that breaks some things of this style. And cuz i DON'T update my FF version soon, you should be patient. VERY PATIENT) • Stylish version 1.4.3 • OS: Windows XP SP3 (Locale en) • I don't use Chrome. I like Opera, ussualy i don't use it too. • I use the DEFAULT THEME with DARK PERSONAS (Lightweight Themes). OR DEVELPER EDITION THEME. • There are some code that you could make better. (i'm a beginner, i'm try to learn.) • a comment? YES. Just be objetive, not subjetive. Remmember that THIS IS STYLISH, PLEASE. YOUR PREFERENCES ISN'T THE ONLY WAY THAT THE THINGS SHOULD BE. This is it! Changelog: ► 2015-06-21 • Addapted code to FF Developer Edition 40.0a2 • Added PANELS couse the way that some "menus" are builded ► 2014-09-07 • Fixed the new bookmarks popup in FF 32. ► 2014-09-06 • Fixed the checked not hover menu image. • Fixed radio checkbox (now selected options in menus are different when is checkbox or radio-checkbox) • Disabled menu item a bit more light. ► 2014-08-25 • Fixed separator for FF31. (In FF 31 the APP MENU panel hasn't be covered yeat) ► 2014-08-16 • Fixed ViewSource and DOM Inspector's menubar background. ► 2014-08-15 ►►► First Release.
